daily.text: Divide the big task into small pieces which can be done every day.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: It used to upset me - now it makes me sad - to see people use patriotism and our troops as a pawn in their political argument. Because I know personally, growing up in a military family, the sacrifice that is made on a daily basis.
daily.author: Tamron Hall

daily.text: Make a plan that concern your purpose, your calling and describes exactly what should be done every day for your purpose and life mission.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: You promote yourself every time you take on a new responsibility.
daily.author: William Gore

daily.text: We should concentrate our work not only to a separated housing problem but housing involved in our daily work and all the other functions of the city.
daily.author: Alvar Aalto

daily.text: We are all vessels of good honour.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Your attitude toward others, work, and your daily life is a reflection of your attitude toward God.
daily.author: Elizabeth George

daily.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: If we don't protect what we have, it will be destroyed.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Seek the blessings each day brings.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: By fundamentally changing how we design the places and systems that enable our daily lives, we can slash emissions way beyond the immediate carbon savings - because our own personal emissions are just the tip of a vast iceberg of energy and resources consumed far from our view.
daily.author: Alex Steffen

daily.text: What parent can give to their children is the gift of daily prayer.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Every new morning brings new mercy, new love and new grace.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: May you find the right path to your destination.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: The Civil Rights Act of 1964 laid the foundation for the Voting Rights Act of 1965, but it also addressed nearly every other aspect of daily life in a would-be free democratic society.
daily.author: Aberjhani

daily.text: Failure is a sign post, directing the right road for life’s journey.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Many losses have gone sinking daily by our inability to recognize the great deal of power reserved in us. Watch out and make it real because soon, it's going to be your turn to shine!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: Teaching does allow me to keep one foot in the youthful waters I tend to occupy in my novels, so I'm thankful for that. My students also remind me on a daily basis that the stories I collected during my district attorney days are actually interesting to people who haven't had that experience.
daily.author: Alafair Burke

daily.text: Start and end your day with God.Seek His presence and blessing daily.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: In the Lord's Prayer, Jesus assumes that asking for forgiveness would be a daily occurrence, as would praying that we might be delivered from evil and led not into temptation.
daily.author: Kevin DeYoung

daily.text: I meet people in my daily life, people who seem to experience some change and some growth on a personal level, and that gives me hope.
daily.author: Tracy Chapman

daily.text: The essence of life is finding something you really love and then making the daily experience worthwhile.
daily.author: Denis Waitley

daily.text: A man can believe a considerable deal of rubbish, and yet go about his daily work in a rational and cheerful manner.
daily.author: Norman Douglas

daily.text: I found that dance, music, and literature is how I made sense of the world... It pushed me to think of things bigger than life's daily routines... To think beyond what is immediate or convenient.
daily.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

daily.text: Until you prove what is in you, what is in you shall always be what is in you.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: The lasting physical and mental health effects of long term very high altitude exposure appear to be remarkably similar to daily heavy smoking.
daily.author: Steven Magee

daily.text: The more expansive government is, the more perils people face in daily lives, be it from IRS agents or from child support services, or from other agencies that often have little or no legal restraints on their power.
daily.author: James Bovard

daily.text: If you have few days to live your life, what will be your passion for last days?
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: In the morning, I use a Philosophy cleanser and Olay Regenerist Daily 3 Point Treatment Cream, which sinks in well and feels firming. I rarely wear foundation, so cotton wool soaked in warm water is often enough to cleanse at night, but I take off eye make-up with Klorane's cornflower-infused remover.
daily.author: Saffron Aldridge

wanderlust.text: It is so gratifying to tell so many stories my eye can romance with, that I become the stories.They shall live on after me, and in that way it makes me immortal.
wanderlust.author: Deejay Kapil

wanderlust.text: I am a world of uncertainties disguised as a girl.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: I hope you know that you are not alone, and in those hours when you feel that you are, just know there are other people out there — singing the same melodies of wanderlust, climbing over mountains in the dark, and waking in the night to stare at the moon, thinking of this large world and dreaming — just like you.
wanderlust.author: Apex

wanderlust.text: You have to keep doing it, Even if no one is watching. The best artists, are those Who live from their expressions, Not chasing the impressions.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: The best traveler is one without a camera.
wanderlust.author: Kamand Kojouri

wanderlust.text: I was forced to wander, having no one, forced by my nature to keep wandering because wandering was the only thing that I believed in, and the only thing that believed in me.
wanderlust.author: Roman Payne

wanderlust.text: It's time to change my life and see the world.
wanderlust.author: Jennifer Coletta

wanderlust.text: Summer is leaving silently. Much like a traveler approaching the end of an amazing journey.
wanderlust.author: Darnell Lamont Walker

wanderlust.text: I'm sorry! I really am! I wanted to get out of this place! I want to live! I want to get away from here and never see it again! I hate everything about it!'You will hate the next place, too,' I said. 'What you are you will carry with you.
wanderlust.author: Louis L'Amour

wanderlust.text: There is no such thing as loving a child too much.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: Explore, Experience, Then Push Beyond.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: Through all his years of roving, even on nights like this, he had remained blind to the beauty of the sea, and now his feeling toward it had settled into weary hatred. He knew its effects of blended color, its wide gradations of sound and action, the tireless charm of a sailing ship's effortless movement, the quality of silent distance and the wonder of the skies. Dimly at times, in moments of rare emotion, he had caught a glimpse of the mystic hand that beckons beyond the horizon and felt for a little while the fated urge of the wanderer. But that was in the beginning, long ago when he had first gone to sea, and he had forgotten it.('Fire In The Galley Stove').
wanderlust.author: William Outerson

wanderlust.text: ..Luxury is the enemy of observation, a costly indulgence that induces such a good feeling that you notice nothing. Luxury spoils and infantilizes you and prevents you from knowing the world. That is its purpose, the reason why luxury cruises and great hotels are full of fatheads who, when they express an opinion, seem as though they are from another planet. It was also my experience that one of the worst aspects of travelling with wealthy people, apart from the fact that the rich never listen, is that they constantly groused about the high cost of living – indeed, the rich usually complained of being poor.
wanderlust.author: Paul Theroux

wanderlust.text: ...But I preferred reading the American landscape as we went along. Every bump, rise, and stretch in it mystified my longing.
wanderlust.author: Jack Kerouac

wanderlust.text: It's in those quiet little towns, at the edge of the world, that you will find the salt of the earth people who make you feel right at home.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: It might be well enough to wander if you've a place and people to come back to, but I tell you now there's no desolation like wanting to go home and truly not knowing where it is.
wanderlust.author: Elizabeth Kerner

wanderlust.text: What is a Wanderess? Bound by no boundaries, contained by no countries, tamed by no time, she is the force of nature’s course.
wanderlust.author: Roman Payne

wanderlust.text: Travel is life-changing. That's the promise made by a thousand websites and magazines, by philosophers and writers down the ages. Mark Twain said it was fatal to prejudice, and Thomas Jefferson said it made you wise. Anais Nin observed that 'we travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls.' It's all true. Self-transformation is what I sought and what I found.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: The fear of rape puts many women in their place - indoors, intimidated, dependent yet again on material barriers and protectors... I was advised to stay indoors at night, to wear baggy clothes, to cover or cut my hair, to try to look like a man, to move someplace more expensive, to take taxis, to buy a car, to move in groups, to get a man to escort me—all modern versions of Greek walls and Assyrian veils, all asserting it was my responsibility to control my own and men's behavior rather than society's to ensure my freedom. I realized that many women had been so successfully socialized to know their place that they had chosen more conservative, gregarious lives without realizing why. The very desire to walk alone had been extinguished in them—but it had not in me.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: The beauty he saw in her was the beauty she forgot to see in herself and what a beautiful reminder, that love is what will see us all through.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: A wave of saudade swept over me as I realized home never existed at all. The concept of home felt far from my reach, and I felt sick with longing.
wanderlust.author: M.B. Dallocchio

wanderlust.text: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
wanderlust.author: Vladimir Nabokov

wanderlust.text: One soft humid early spring morning driving a winding road across Mount Tamalpais, the 2,500-foot mountain just north of the Golden Gate Bridge, a bend reveals a sudden vision of San Francisco in shades of blue, a city in a dream, and I was filled with a tremendous yearning to live in that place of blue hills and blue buildings, though I do live there, I had just left there after breakfast.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: Without struggle, success has no value.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: You don't even know where I'm going.'I don't care. I'd like to go anywhere.
wanderlust.author: John Steinbeck

wanderlust.text: I was lieing to myself when I thought I was lost, I have never been lost - I just wasn't ready to be found.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: It was the inverse of an island in the sea.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: It was a place as blank as a sheet of paper. It was the place I had always been looking for... Flat expanses would call to me... These are the places where the desert is most itself: stark, open, free, an invitation to wander, a laboratory of perception, scale, light, a place where loneliness has a luxurious flavor...
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: I get butterflies every time I wander beautiful places I've never been.
wanderlust.author: Katrice Cabral

motivational.text: The bigger the bricks critics throw at you the bigger the palace you are going to build.
motivational.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

motivational.text: When you fall for your appetite too early, you may not be able to endure to the end.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

motivational.text: First Cosmic Seal:(Devic Seal 333) One who has received this Cosmic Seal is empowered to control not less than 40,000 spirits.
motivational.author: Compton Gage

motivational.text: It is one thing to know what should be done, it is another to do it.
motivational.author: Steve Backley

motivational.text: If roses did not suffer thorns on their journey to beauty, they would lose out on becoming masterpieces.
motivational.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

motivational.text: This is what made the difference, they used social networking for entertainment and I used it for business.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: She simply converted an average face into beautiful face and a beautiful face into an angelic face.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: Failure is a sign post, directing the right road for life’s journey.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: Not all angels come from above. Some are beside you or around you even as we speak. Then why can't we see them? Because we are too busy searching for them elsewhere. We won't find them unless we stop looking for them amongst the demons or in our prayers offered to the Gods. Open your eyes, perceive your vicinity and analyse people - only then will you find the true angels.
motivational.author: Adhish Mazumder

motivational.text: It is possible for you to realise your dream as a scientist, you must be a passionate learner and curious enough to seek this wonderful career path.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
motivational.author: Auliq-Ice

motivational.text: For every can't, there's a can. Cans are worth money, so you'd better start collecting them.
motivational.author: Bianca McCormick-Johnson

motivational.text: To become a better you, remember to be grateful to people who have contributed to making you who you are today.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

motivational.text: With every step we take we have a choice to make. Our choices determine our actions. Our actions determine who we are.
motivational.author: Randall Marr

motivational.text: Take all of your wasted honorEvery little past frustrationTake all of your so-called problems,Better put 'em in quotations.
motivational.author: John Mayer

motivational.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: A single man is minority, a leader is the majority.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
motivational.author: Jay Samit

motivational.text: The sadness sorrow is to desire death while you have life.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: Success sits on a mountain of mistakes.
motivational.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

motivational.text: Follow your heart. Then root its longing with the facts.
motivational.author: Gina Greenlee

motivational.text: To make 2013 (or any other)your year, keep it simple:1) Count your blessings first2) Whatever you did last year, Do it better3) Go step by step, One day at a time.4) Create/make your own opportunities.5) Believe in your abilities at all times,6) Qutting is not an option. Keep Going.7) Finish what you started.
motivational.author: Pablo

motivational.text: When a lion kills a deer it does not build negative KARMA, its meant that way!!!!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

love.text: Fine,” he said. “You’re right. We’re not normal. We’re the most fucked-up, star-crossed lovers in history. So let’s not play nice.
love.author: Larissa Ione

love.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
love.author: Ted Chiang

love.text: To reciprocate God’s love is to have the nature of love.
love.author: Sunday Adelaja

love.text: How queer it was for two lovers to suddenly turn into strangers?
love.author: Diyar Harraz

love.text: If your consciousness is without form, without quality, and without characteristics of any kind, would that not imply that the consciousness in every other being is also formless? And if they are all without form, how can you distinguish their consciousness from your own? What forms would you use to compare them? Isn’t the observing you exactly the same as the observing them?
love.author: Joseph P. Kauffman

love.text: As long as we don't cut off our hearts, the inner workings of the universe illuminate before us.
love.author: Rivera Sun

love.text: I'll follow you to the next life if I have to,' he whispered harshly in her ear. 'You'll never be free of me. I'll chase you through heaven and hell and beyond.' He continued to whisper without stopping while his hands gripped her body close to his. 'You stay with me, Holly,' he muttered savagely. 'Don't do this to me. You stay, damn you.
love.author: Lisa Kleypas

love.text: I turn my head so that he doesn't see my smile and secretly curse him for making me feel special.
love.author: Kasie West

love.text: She was learning something important: how to live within the sound of her own slow breathing, how to love the view when her eyes were shut.
love.author: Gwendoline Riley

love.text: I'd love to promise a lifetime to you. I just don't have one to give.
love.author: Kelly Rimmer

love.text: A great giftwe can giveto ourselvesis a willingnessto love everyone,no matter what.This frees us completely from the toxicjustificationswe use to hate.
love.author: Scott Stabile

love.text: One loves truly only once in a lifetime, Julian, even if one isn’t aware of it.
love.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

love.text: It is well to believe that there needs but a little more thought, a little more courage, more love, more devotion to life, a little more eagerness, one day to fling open wide the portals of joy and of truth.
love.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

love.text: It's so difficult to love another person and yourself for who they are and not what they do or who they could be. To stay in this moment and know it in all its pleasure and its pain. The world is a beautiful place. How often do we say this aloud?
love.author: Vicki Forman

love.text: How little we know the ones we love. How little we know of anyone, in the end.
love.author: Aria Beth Sloss

love.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
love.author: Ally Condie

love.text: I laughed as we turned in a tight circle... 'Tonight you're all mine.'Jake smiled but looked me dead in the eye. 'No. From now on.'My heart skipped. 'What?'Yours,' he said simply, 'from now on.
love.author: Kieran Scott

love.text: I sing to use the waiting,  My bonnet but to tie, And shut the door unto my house;  No more to do have I, Till, his best step approaching,  We journey to the day, And tell each other how we sang  To keep the dark away.
love.author: Emily Dickinson

love.text: Love people. Use things. The opposite never works.
love.author: The Minimalists

love.text: We have to consciously study how to be tender with each other until it becomes a habit because what was native has been stolen from us, the love of Black women for each other.
love.author: Audre Lorde

love.text: We heal up through being loved, and through loving others. We don't heal by forming a secret society of one - by assessing about the only other 'one' we might admit, and being doomed to disappointment.
love.author: Jeanette Winterson

love.text: Love lost is better than hate found. True criticism is better than false praise. Genuine enemies are better than counterfeit friends.
love.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

love.text: Passion is the driving element of purpose. When one is possessed with it, labor is not perceived as toil - it is revealed as love.
love.author: T.F. Hodge

love.text: Southern gentleman,” he said aside to him in Arabic. “Do you wish for me to continue this for you?”Caine’s temper shifted to a low simmer in his chest. “Your way takes too long.”“Ma’aleyk, and your way hurts my ears,” he argued.
love.author: V.S. Carnes

love.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: To begin to know ourselves we must have sincere conversations with ourselves as if with a good friend. We must answer without reserve, listen without judgement, and accept without condition. That is self-love.
love.author: Kamand Kojouri

love.text: They did not use the sonic stunners but the foray gun, the ancient weapon that fires a set of metal fragments in a burst. They shot to kill him. He was dying when I got to him, sprawled and twisted away from his skis that stuck up out of the snow, his chest half shot away. I took his head in my arms and spoke to him, but he never answered me; only in a way he answered my love for him, crying out through the silent wreck and tumult of his mind as consciousness lapsed, in the unspoken tongue, once, clearly, 'Arek!' Then no more. I held him, crouching there in the snow, while he died. They let me do that. Then they made me get up, and took me off one way and him another, I going to prison and he into the dark.
love.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

happiness.text: Life is the greatest fortune.
happiness.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

happiness.text: I don’t remember now who took the photo of us, but I’ve had it in my room for years. We’re leaning out of our windows and we’re laughing at each other with joyfulness purer than anything to do with the polite smiling you get used to doing when you get older. The photo has the kind of proper smiles that happen when you’re looking straight into the face of someone who’s been your best friend for a long time.
happiness.author: Sarah Moore Fitzgerald

happiness.text: We live in a terrible world, 'happiness' is defined by how lucky you are in society, let me say this; out of life experiences spanning throughout my 19-20 years of my life, I learned that life is unfair, but ironically, every time I TRY to do something right, it gets spit back in my f###### face. In short, even though it may sound depressing or negative, in life, it is desperately not fair, nothing will be happy or normal and if something happens that you thought shouldn't or cant, it's going to happen anyway, the truth is the truth, and the truth hurts, deal with it, and sometimes nothing will ever get better from there ever again, deal with it.
happiness.author: C.J. Butler

happiness.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Anarchy is against the law.
happiness.author: Graffiti

happiness.text: I felt I could turn the earth upside down with my littlest finger. I wanted to dance, to fly in the air and kiss the sun and stars with my singing heart. I, alone with myself, was enjoying myself for the first time as with grandest company.
happiness.author: Anzia Yezierska

happiness.text: It is painful those feelings of pain,but accept it with love to see the gain.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: When you are focused on what you're doing, you are not going to miss the next opportunity ... It's more likely that you get more!
happiness.author: Stephen Richards

happiness.text: Never pursue happiness, just create the happiness inside you.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: It is indisputable that the being whose capacities of enjoyment are low, has the greatest chance of having them fully satisfied; and a highly endowed being will always feel that any happiness which he can look for, as the world is constituted, is imperfect. But he can learn to bear its imperfections, if they are at all bearable; and they will not make him envy the being who is indeed unconscious of the imperfections, but only because he feels not at all the good which those imperfections qualify.  Dissatisfied than a fool satisfied. And if the fool, or the pig, is of a different opinion, it is only because they only know their own side of the question.
happiness.author: John Stuart Mill

happiness.text: I like to believe that you don't need to reach a certain goal to be happy. I prefer to think that happiness is always there, and that when things don't go the way we might like them to, it's a sign from above that something even better is right around the corner.
happiness.author: David Archuleta

happiness.text: All in good time is something Cosmic Ordering does not follow.
happiness.author: Stephen Richards

happiness.text: To promote peace, promote understanding. To promote understanding, promote love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: The magic of love is that it becomes our memory which we never can forget.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Democracy is probably the only discovery by mankind which mostly brought it only happiness.
happiness.author: Amit Kalantri

happiness.text: Happiness is in our own hearts. I have no regrets of anything in the past. I'm totally cheerful and happy, and I think that a lot of your attitude is not in the circumstances you find yourself in, but in the circumstances you make for yourself.
happiness.author: Maeve Binchy

happiness.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
happiness.author: Ted Chiang

happiness.text: Perfectionism is a lost cause.Focus your energy on beingthe best you can be.
happiness.author: Domonique Bertolucci

happiness.text: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Wisdom is creating connections between the current perceptual realities with future imaginative possibilities.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: People who have wellbeing and feel fulfilled, need far less than people who feel unfulfilled, who always seem to need more.' By Rethinking Your Mindset you can create SWIFT sustainable success.
happiness.author: Tony Dovale

happiness.text: When you are in doubt and lost, to find the way, chose love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
happiness.author: Don Marquis

happiness.text: I wanted to tell her happy was hard for me. But I think she already knew that.
happiness.author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz

happiness.text: You may not always change your situation but you can always change your perception. For better or worse, it will change the situation.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Death is not considerate, or fair.
happiness.author: Compton Gage

happiness.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Happiness is an awareness—a blissful perception, not in ownership or in material possessions.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: We cannot really love anybody with whom we never laugh.
happiness.author: Agnes Repplier

positive.text: You are a wonderful sacred-soul.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions  and not our circumstances.
positive.author: Martha Washington

positive.text: Not every problem can be solved. Some are okay simply to avoid. Go around the, go under them, whatever it takes to reach your higher goal. Sometimes you have to fail your way to success.
positive.author: Anna Mitchael

positive.text: If you make fun of bad persons you make yourself beneath them. ... Be kind to bad and good  for you don't know your own heart.
positive.author: Sarah Winnemucca

positive.text: I will sacrifice today for tomorrow.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: If you think the world is full of darkness, let us see your light. If you think the world is full of wickedness, let us see your goodness. If you think people are acting wrongly, let us see your right action. If you think people don't know, let us see what you know. If you think the world is full of uncaring people let us see how you care about people. If you think life is not being fair to you, let us see how you can be fair to life. If you think people are proud, let us see your humility. We can easily find fault and we can easily see what is wrong but a positive attitude backed by a right action in a true direction is all we need to survive in peace and harmony in the arena of life.
positive.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

positive.text: When God gives you an idea, you must act immediately on it.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Be Happy & Appreciate Every Little Thing You Have/Get Because When You Get The Big Thing, The Happiness Would Be Unbound....
positive.author: Muhammad Imran Hasan

positive.text: If we are not responsible for the thoughts that pass our doors  we are at least responsible for those we admit and entertain.
positive.author: Charles B. Newcomb

positive.text: A word after a word after a word is power.
positive.author: Margaret Atwood

positive.text: Be careful of your thoughts  they may become words at any moment.
positive.author: Ira Gassen

positive.text: Don’t be a victim of circumstances. Choose victory by gracious endurance.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Journal writing is a voyage to the interior.
positive.author: Christina Baldwin

positive.text: You have the power to realise your dream. If only you are willing and determined.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Outside the Olympics, there are massive discrepancies within all sports. But the positive side for me is that the Olympics are the biggest platform there is, and there's total equality across all sports.
positive.author: Lizzie Armitstead

positive.text: Think like a man of action  act like a man of thought.
positive.author: Henri Bergson

positive.text: The science of psychology has been far more successful on the negative than on the positive side... It has revealed to us much about man's shortcomings, his illnesses, his sins, but little about his potentialities, his virtues, his achievable aspirations, or his psychological health.
positive.author: Abraham Maslow

positive.text: Dwell on positive thoughts!
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Man's delight in the Lord is the absolute peak of human triumph. He praises God when full of joy, and when not, he praises God to become full of joy. For to know and to live as though God is worthy of all praise, in all one's circumstances, whether seemingly good or seemingly bad, is the primary definition of joy and the richest triumph for man under God.
strength.author: Criss Jami

strength.text: How can the face that welcomed me into the world be the face I'll soon forget? How can the body I came through be the body I don't really know?
strength.author: Michelle Carithers

strength.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Why do people feel better when they blame someone? I don’t know. Maybe it just feels better to be angry than to be sad.
strength.author: Kate McGahan

strength.text: Strength is not defined by the load you bear, it’s defined by the amount you can bend before breaking.
strength.author: Blake Mays

strength.text: Luck is for those with nothing else. I wish you strength and courage.
strength.author: Annette Marie

strength.text: May you find the strength to pursue your dreams.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
strength.author: Bram Stoker

strength.text: Be thankful to those who refuse to help you, for they force you to summon upon your warrior within.
strength.author: Miya Yamanouchi

strength.text: Hope is strength of soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Her fatigue was gone; she felt vital and strong, like a tree coming back to life in the springtime, vibrant with sap, ready to put out buds and then blossoms.
strength.author: Linda Lael Miller

strength.text: In life,You can either play the hand you've been dealt or decide to fold. Just remember that you are not alone in this journey of life. People experience hardships all the time. You learn from those difficult moments and become stronger.
strength.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

strength.text: The closer we try to get to God, the more we will hate to sin in our own lives, the more we are saddened by the thoughts that runs through our minds. I also think that the more we draw closer to God, the more God will honour us and will open doors for the right things to happen in our life.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: Endure despite the pain. The key is grace of strength.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: She can feel his blood, just beneath his skin; when he breathes, the air fills with smoke. He's like a dragon, ancient and fearless.
strength.author: Alice Hoffman

strength.text: A father gives his child nothing better than a good education.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
strength.author: Ally Condie

strength.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: WISDOM is the STRONGEST weapon you could EVER acquire in your LIFETIME.
strength.author: Anonymous

strength.text: People who always want to be at convenient places won’t make a change at controversial places.
strength.author: Israelmore Ayivor

strength.text: Awake my great strength.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: We think we are so strong but it is only when others try to prey on our weaknesses that we realize how frail we truly are.”-Skyla (from Twiceborn).
strength.author: JP Robinson

strength.text: For frail but surprisingly strong fairies who had lost their way above groundfor burned mermaids and sick vampire girlsfor wild wolfish women with sharp teeth and leaves in their hair.
strength.author: Francesca Lia Block

strength.text: With determined spirit you can overpower any difficulty.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Never complain, pray for strength to overcome the difficulty.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: The pain of the journey should challenge you to make change, the vision of what could be drives you forward.
strength.author: Tony Curl

strength.text: Its hardness and solidity had been an odd kind of comfort. Do not wish for anything. Be and endure. The Old African had learned that enduring was power too, and just as he had been drawn to the boulder, so the slaves, after a while, were drawn to him.
strength.author: Julius Lester

strength.text: We fall many times. But we find strength within to rise again.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Would he ever have the strength to stop looking?
strength.author: J.K. Rowling
